Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that President Trump "slipped out of sight for a few hours" to visit Emilee Imbar, when in reality the meeting only lasted for a few minutes.
Understate: The claim understates the significance of the meeting by stating that it was largely unreported by American news outlets.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide evidence or sources to back up the statement.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the assumption that the meeting with Emilee Imbar was ignored or intentionally not reported by mainstream media outlets.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim presents an alternative explanation by stating that the meeting with Emilee Imbar took place at the Yad Vashem Holocaust memorial during a speech by President Trump.
